properties.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Southern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Northern Coos; Southern Somerset; Southern Coos
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:52AM EST until January 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of northern New Hampshire and south central
and western Maine.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation this afternoon into the early
evening will be initially light and patchy with a glaze of ice
possible over the cooler higher elevations. Steadier, heavier
precipitation arrives this evening and tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
